channel.title: Adding C Wars
channel.description: Ok my server is getting along great. And my members have been begging me for updates. I just updated a Team pking place and stuff. and i was thinking. c wars would be awesome! except this server has like basically no cwars...i was wondering if anyone out there has a source with cwars in it and can give me the codes i need to add to make it decently compatible with cwars. thankz!

item.title: Adding C Wars
item.dc:creator: @qsmith qsmith
item.description:
@qsmith wrote:

it takes alot of stuff to git even a decent castle wars going. let alown a good one that has no glitches.

Read full topic
